entry.title: Toronto after one year
entry.content:
Goal

This list was created after one of my colleagues asked me about places he should visit during his time in Toronto. Since I live there only for one year, I thought it would be good to summarize and record this list so I come back to it later.

Food

  • Pho Tien Thanh - Must visit, pho and rice are amazing.

  • Dessert Lady Cafe & Bakery - Visit for cakes and sandwiches.

  • Bang Bang Ice Cream & Bakery - Best ice cream in the city.

  • Summer's Ice Cream - One of the best ice creams.

  • KIBO Secret Garden - Visit for nice sushi.

  • Coffee Lunar - Best London fog.

  • Umami Poke - Nice and healthy.

  • NEO COFFEE BAR - Good enough coffee.

  • Dineen Coffee Co. - Like to work here on the weekend.

  • Mizzica Gelateria & Cafe - Healthy ice cream.

  • Laissez Faire - Nice new place.

  • 135 ossington - Coffee and matcha.

  • Cafe Polonez - Amazing Polish food.

  • Barrel House Korchma - Great Ukrainian kitchen.

  • Aster's Refined Cakes - Visit for desserts.

  • ONE Restaurant - Fancy place.

  • Eataly Toronto - Supermarket with cafe inside.

  • Shisha Marquise - Still trying to find a good shisha, but so far using this.

Sport

  • United Boxing Club - My boxing club.

Visit

  • Art Gallery of Ontario - Not Sistine Chapel or Uffizi Gallery, but still good to visit.
  • Berczy Park - Nice little park.
  • Queens Park - Great park in the city center.

entry.title: Why
entry.content:
"Writing is its own reward." --Henry Miller

Why

As writing might help to develop a better way of thinking and structuring your thought I would like to start doing this regularly and in a systematic way. Those are my own blog and opinions, which might change and evolve over time. I am not a native English speaker and never had a writing class in my life, but I will try my best. If you find this useful good for you, if no - no hard feeling, the only user and beneficiary for this blog is me and only me.

How

Markdown and version control systems are the best tools ever.

entry.title: About
entry.content:
Into

Hey everyone, I am Kyryl Truskovskyi.

  • Machine Learning Engineer at Georgian.
  • My path so far is: Donetsk, Ukraine -> Kyiv, Ukraine -> Montreal, Canada -> Toronto, Canada.
  • You can reach out to me in 3 languages: English, Ukrainian, and French.
  • Most of the time I do 3 things: working, boxing, or traveling.

Contact

Twitter: https://twitter.com/truskovskiy
Github: https://github.com/truskovskiyk
LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/kyryl-truskovskyi-275b7967/

War

Like for any Ukrainian. War, since 2014 and full-scale invasion since 2022, is a big part of my life and who I am. Please support the Ukrainian army. My thoughts about this you can find here
